title: Korea Bay, North Korea
description:
The Korea Bay, sometimes the West Korea Bay is a northern extension of the Yellow Sea, between Liaoning Province of China and North P'yŏngan Province of North Korea.
It is separated from the Bohai by the Liaodong Peninsula, with Dalian at its southernmost point.
theme:
WATER. Something special that holds
all life together
